actions.text: Amendment SA 1899 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1899 proposed by Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S13076-13079) Making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation and Treasury, the Executive Office of the President, and certain independent agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1899 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1899 proposed by Senator Shelby.

purpose: Making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation and Treasury, the Executive Office of the President, and certain independent agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004, and for other purposes.
